topic.title: EMS Allergies And Adverse Reactions Section - conformance rules

lines.i: Information regarding patient allergies and sensitivities

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.13"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="48765-2" Allergies and adverse reactions Document (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10196)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "EMS Allergies and Adverse Reactions" (CONF:10948)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:10953)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Non Drug Allergy Organizer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.49)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11319)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Drug Allergy Organizer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.183)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="48765-2" Allergies and adverse reactions Document (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10196)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "EMS Allergies and Adverse Reactions" (CONF:10948)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:10953)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Non Drug Allergy Organizer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.49)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11319)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Drug Allergy Organizer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.183)
